sentences.en: A microcomputerized control system for hot press in making hardboard is de - signed.
sentences.cn: 本文提出了一种硬质纤维板热压 机微机 控制系统的设计方案.

sentences.en: First : we cut the time as soon as piece hardboard.
sentences.cn: 第一：我们的时间削减尽快一块硬纸板。

sentences.en: Ocean freight is approximately $ 28.00 for the insulate board, and $ 10.00 for the standard hardboard, per 1,000 square feet.
sentences.cn: 海上运费, 每1000平方英尺绝缘板约28美元, 标准硬质纤维板为10美元.

sentences.en: Then I stayed up the whole night, waving a hardboard to keep mosquitoes from approaching her just like a guard.
sentences.cn: 那天我一夜没睡，我拿著一个硬纸板挥动著，像一名士兵，不让蚊虫靠近她的身体。

sentences.en: This article approached the dehydrating and exhausting laws of wet - way hardboard in the hot - pressing course.
sentences.cn: 本文探讨了湿法硬质纤维板在热压过程中的脱水排汽规律.
